title: Jazz n' Jive
info: Jazz up your Monday nights with intimate and lively performances by a rotating selection of renowned bands.

title: Burlesque After Dark
info: Enter the world of burlesque and lose yourself in enticing witty performances, exceptional cocktails, and lively music.

title: DJs & Dance Tracks

title: In Memory of Amy
info: With the likes of Rihanna, Jessie J and Lady Gaga honouring Amy Winehouse for her amazing contribution to music, Amy's dad Mitch is planning a memorial concert.
